verses.verse: Forasmuch then as <S%G3767><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> hath suffered <S%G3958><s%> <S%G5631><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> in the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, arm <S%G3695><s%> <S%G5669><s%> yourselves <S%G5210><s%> likewise <S%G2532><s%> with the same <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G1771><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> he that hath suffered <S%G3958><s%> <S%G5631><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> hath ceased <S%G3973><s%> <S%G5769><s%> from sin <S%G266><s%>;

That <S%G1519><s%> he <S%G980><s%> no longer <S%G3371><s%> should live <S%G980><s%> <S%G5658><s%> the rest <S%G1954><s%> of his time <S%G5550><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> to the lusts <S%G1939><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> to the will <S%G2307><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the time <S%G5550><s%> past <S%G3928><s%> <S%G5756><s%> of our life <S%G979><s%> may suffice <S%G713><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> to have wrought <S%G2716><s%> <S%G5664><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of the goyim <S%G1484><s%>, when we walked <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5768><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> lasciviousness <S%G766><s%>, lusts <S%G1939><s%>, excess of wine <S%G3632><s%>, revellings <S%G2970><s%>, banquetings <S%G4224><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> abominable <S%G111><s%> idolatries <S%G1495><s%>:

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> they think it strange <S%G3579><s%> <S%G5743><s%> that ye <S%G5216><s%> run <S%G4936><s%> <S%G5723><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> with them to <S%G1519><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> excess <S%G401><s%> of riot <S%G810><s%>, speaking evil of <S%G987><s%> <S%G5723><s%> you:

Who <S%G3739><s%> shall give <S%G591><s%> <S%G5692><s%> account <S%G3056><s%> to him that is <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> ready <S%G2093><s%> to judge <S%G2919><s%> <S%G5658><s%> the quick <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5723><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> this cause <S%G5124><s%> was the gospel preached <S%G2097><s%> <S%G5681><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to them that are dead <S%G3498><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they might be judged <S%G2919><s%> <S%G5686><s%> <S%G3303><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> men <S%G444><s%> in the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5725><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> in the spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> of all things <S%G3956><s%> is at hand <S%G1448><s%> <S%G5758><s%>: be ye <S%G4993><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> sober <S%G4993><s%> <S%G5657><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> watch <S%G3525><s%> <S%G5657><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> prayer <S%G4335><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> above <S%G4253><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> fervent <S%G1618><s%> charity <S%G26><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> charity <S%G26><s%> shall cover <S%G2572><s%> <S%G5692><s%> the multitude <S%G4128><s%> of sins <S%G266><s%>.
Use hospitality <S%G5382><s%> one to another <S%G1519><s%> <S%G240><s%> without <S%G427><s%> grudging <S%G1112><s%>.

As <S%G2531><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%> hath received <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5627><s%> the gift <S%G5486><s%>, even so minister <S%G1247><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> one to another <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1438><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> stewards <S%G3623><s%> of the manifold <S%G4164><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

If any man <S%G1536><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, let him speak as <S%G5613><s%> the oracles <S%G3051><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>; if any man <S%G1536><s%> minister <S%G1247><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, let him do it as <S%G5613><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the ability <S%G2479><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> giveth <S%G5524><s%> <S%G5719><s%>: that <S%G2443><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> may be glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5747><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, to whom <S%G3739><s%> be <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> praise <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> dominion <S%G2904><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.

Beloved <S%G27><s%>, think it <S%G3579><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> strange <S%G3579><s%> <S%G5744><s%> concerning the <S%G5213><s%> fiery trial <S%G4451><s%> which <S%G1722><s%> is <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5740><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> try <S%G3986><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> though some strange thing <S%G3581><s%> happened <S%G4819><s%> <S%G5723><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>:

But <S%G235><s%> rejoice <S%G5463><s%> <S%G5720><s%>, inasmuch as <S%G2526><s%> ye are partakers <S%G2841><s%> <S%G5719><s%> of Moshiach's <S%G5547><s%> sufferings <S%G3804><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%>, when <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> shall be revealed <S%G602><s%>, ye may be glad <S%G5463><s%> <S%G5647><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> with exceeding joy <S%G21><s%> <S%G5740><s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> ye be reproached <S%G3679><s%> <S%G5743><s%> for <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, happy <S%G3107><s%> are ye; for <S%G3754><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> resteth <S%G373><s%> <S%G5731><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>: on <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3303><s%> their part <S%G846><s%> he is evil spoken of <S%G987><s%> <S%G5743><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> on <S%G2596><s%> your part <S%G5209><s%> he is glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5743><s%>.

But <S%G1063><s%> let <S%G3958><s%> none <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5100><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> <S%G5720><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a murderer <S%G5406><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> as a thief <S%G2812><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> as an evildoer <S%G2555><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a busybody in other men's matters <S%G244><s%>.

Yet <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any man suffer as <S%G5613><s%> a Messianic <S%G5546><s%>, let him <S%G153><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> be ashamed <S%G153><s%> <S%G5744><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> let him glorify <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5720><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> behalf <S%G3313><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> is come that judgment <S%G2917><s%> must begin <S%G756><s%> <S%G5670><s%> at <S%G575><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> it first <S%G4412><s%> begin at <S%G575><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> shall the end <S%G5056><s%> be of them that obey not <S%G544><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%> scarcely <S%G3433><s%> be saved <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5743><s%>, where <S%G4226><s%> shall <S%G5316><s%> the ungodly <S%G765><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the sinner <S%G268><s%> appear <S%G5316><s%> <S%G5695><s%>?

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G3908><s%> them that suffer <S%G3958><s%> <S%G5723><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> commit the keeping <S%G3908><s%> <S%G5744><s%> of their <S%G1438><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%> to him in <S%G1722><s%> well doing <S%G16><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> unto a faithful <S%G4103><s%> Creator <S%G2939><s%>.
